comments:
Eclipse 20020515
Windows 2000

Note: I tried this also in 0508 and the problem did not occur.  I also tried it 
on 0515 with the SWT plugin from 0508 and it still happens.

1) start a brand new eclipse workspace
2) create a java project
3) create a file abc.doc in the project
4) create a file xyz.bmp in the project
5) click between the files - no exception
6) close eclipse
7) open eclipse - the first ole editor is displayed no problem
8) select the tab of the second ole editor
get the following error:
